properties.description: Apontamento provisório para o Banco de dados da Kyros

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	pLote as string
}
source(output(
		NOTA_FISCAL_ORIG as string,
		VLR_ORIG_NSFT as decimal(15,2),
		SERIE_NF as string,
		descr_operadora as string,
		COD_IDENT_CLI as string,
		CPF_CNPJ as string,
		VLR_ATRIBUIDO as decimal(15,2),
		DT_ATRIBUICAO as timestamp,
		DT_AJUSTE as timestamp,
		COD_MOTIVO_AJUSTE as string,
		DT_ABERTURA_IMPUG as timestamp,
		NUM_FATURA_ORIGINAL as string,
		DT_VENC_FATURA_ORIGINAL as timestamp,
		DT_EMISSAO_FATURA as timestamp,
		VLR_FATURA as decimal(15,2),
		SALDO_DEVEDOR as decimal(15,2),
		UF_FATURA as string,
		TIPO_DOCUMENTO as string,
		CONTACONTABIL_CR as string,
		CONTACONTABIL_DB as string,
		DESCR_CONTACONTABIL_DB as string,
		DESCR_CONTACONTABIL_CR as string,
		SALDO_POS_AJUSTE as decimal(15,2),
		TIPO_OPERACAO as string,
		DT_VENCTO_FAT_FUTURA as timestamp,
		VLR_AJUSTE_ITEM as decimal(15,2),
		VLR_CREDITO_AJUSTE as decimal(15,2),
		VLR_DEVOLUCAO as decimal(15,2),
		VLR_FATURA_FUTURA as decimal(15,2),
		COD_FAC_CD as decimal(10,0),
		COD_OPERADORA as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: ("SELECT np.nota_fiscal_orig AS NOTA_FISCAL_ORIG,np.vlr_orig_nsft AS VLR_ORIG_NSFT,np.serie_nf AS SERIE_NF, np.descr_operadora,np.cod_ident_cli AS COD_IDENT_CLI,np.cpf_cnpj	AS CPF_CNPJ,np.vlr_contestado AS VLR_ATRIBUIDO,np.dt_vencto_boleto_ult AS DT_ATRIBUICAO,np.dt_ajuste AS	DT_AJUSTE,np.cod_motivo_ajuste AS COD_MOTIVO_AJUSTE,np.dt_abertura_impug AS	DT_ABERTURA_IMPUG,np.num_fatura_original AS NUM_FATURA_ORIGINAL,np.dt_venc_fatura_original AS DT_VENC_FATURA_ORIGINAL,        np.dt_emissao_fatura AS	DT_EMISSAO_FATURA,np.vlr_fatura AS VLR_FATURA,np.saldo_devedor AS SALDO_DEVEDOR,np.uf_fatura AS UF_FATURA,np.tipo_documento AS TIPO_DOCUMENTO,np.contacontabil AS CONTACONTABIL_CR,np.contacontabil AS CONTACONTABIL_DB,np.descrcontacontabil AS DESCR_CONTACONTABIL_DB,np.descrcontacontabil AS DESCR_CONTACONTABIL_CR,np.saldo_pos_ajuste AS SALDO_POS_AJUSTE,np.tipo_operacao AS	TIPO_OPERACAO,np.dt_venc_fatura_original AS DT_VENCTO_FAT_FUTURA, NULL AS	VLR_AJUSTE_ITEM, NULL AS VLR_CREDITO_AJUSTE, NULL AS VLR_DEVOLUCAO, NULL AS	VLR_FATURA_FUTURA,np.cod_fac_cd AS COD_FAC_CD,np.cod_operadora AS COD_OPERADORA FROM convenio.cvtb_atis_nao_pago np WHERE id_lote_arquivo IN (SELECT id_lote_arquivo FROM CONVENIO.CVTB_LOTE_ARQUIVO WHERE ID_LOTE = {$pLote}) UNION SELECT  ap.nota_fiscal_orig AS NOTA_FISCAL_ORIG,ap.vlr_orig_nsft AS VLR_ORIG_NSFT, ap.serie_nf AS SERIE_NF, ap.descr_operadora AS DESCR_OPERADORA, ap.cod_ident_cli AS COD_IDENT_CLI,ap.cpf_cnpj	AS CPF_CNPJ, ap.vlr_credito_item AS	VLR_ATRIBUIDO,ap.dt_vencto_boleto_ult AS DT_ATRIBUICAO, ap.dt_ajuste AS	DT_AJUSTE,ap.cod_motivo_ajuste AS	COD_MOTIVO_AJUSTE, ap.dt_abertura_impug AS	DT_ABERTURA_IMPUG,ap.num_fatura_original AS	NUM_FATURA_ORIGINAL,ap.dt_venc_fatura_original AS	DT_VENC_FATURA_ORIGINAL, ap.dt_emissao_fatura AS DT_EMISSAO_FATURA,ap.vlr_fatura AS	VLR_FATURA,ap.saldo_devedor AS	SALDO_DEVEDOR,ap.uf_fatura AS UF_FATURA, ap.tipo_documento AS TIPO_DOCUMENTO, ap.contacontabil AS CONTACONTABIL_CR,ap.contacontabil AS CONTACONTABIL_DB,ap.descrcontacontabil AS DESCR_CONTACONTABIL_DB , ap.descrcontacontabil AS DESCR_CONTACONTABIL_CR,ap.saldo_pos_ajuste	AS SALDO_POS_AJUSTE,ap.tipo_operacao AS	TIPO_OPERACAO,ap.dt_venc_fatura_original AS DT_VENCTO_FAT_FUTURA,ap.vlr_ajuste_item AS	VLR_AJUSTE_ITEM,ap.vlr_credito_ajuste AS VALOR_CREDITO_AJUSTE,ap.vlr_devolucao AS	VLR_DEVOLUCAO,ap.vlr_fatura_futura AS VLR_FATURA_FUTURA,ap.cod_fac_cd AS COD_FAC_CD,ap.cod_operadora AS	COD_OPERADORA FROM convenio.cvtb_atis_pago ap WHERE id_lote_arquivo IN (SELECT id_lote_arquivo FROM CONVENIO.CVTB_LOTE_ARQUIVO WHERE ID_LOTE = {$pLote})"),
	format: 'query') ~> TabelaAtis
TabelaAtis derive(id_lote_ajuste = $pLote,
		nome_billing = 'Atis',
		nota_fiscal_orig_normalizado = replace(trim(NUM_FATURA_ORIGINAL), right(NUM_FATURA_ORIGINAL, 4), ''),
		num_controle_reclamacao_normalizado = concat(trim(SERIE_NF), '123'),
		cd_criado_por = 'Carga ADF - CargaArqAtis',
		dt_criado_em = add(currentTimestamp(), hours(-3)),
		fl_status_geral = 'NT') ~> AdaptaColunas
AdaptaColunas sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		ID_CONTESTACAO as decimal(28,0),
		ID_CLIENTE as string,
		NOTA_FISCAL_ORIG as string,
		DT_EMISSAO_NF_ORIG as timestamp,
		VLR_ORIG_NSFT as decimal(15,2),
		SERIE_NF as string,
		COD_IDENT_CLI as string,
		CPF_CNPJ as string,
		NOME_CLIENTE as string,
		TERMINAL as string,
		VLR_TOTAL_ATRIBUIDO as decimal(15,2),
		VLR_ATRIBUIDO as decimal(15,2),
		DT_ATRIBUICAO as timestamp,
		DT_AJUSTE as timestamp,
		DESCR_OPERADORA as string,
		COD_OPERADORA as string,
		COD_MOTIVO_AJUSTE as string,
		DESC_MOTIVO_AJUSTE as string,
		NUM_CONTROLE_RECLAMACAO as string,
		CLASSE_RECEBER as string,
		CONTA_FINANCEIRA as string,
		DESC_CONTA_FINANCEIRA as string,
		NUM_FATURA_ORIGINAL as string,
		VLR_DOC_ORIGINAL as decimal(15,2),
		FATURA_ATRIBUIDA as string,
		DT_EMISSAO_FATURA as timestamp,
		VLR_FATURA as decimal(15,2),
		UF_FATURA as string,
		SEQ_RECEBIVEL as string,
		DT_EMISSAO as timestamp,
		MODELO as string,
		NUMORDEMDOITEM as decimal(3,0),
		BC_ICMS as decimal(15,2),
		ICMS as decimal(15,2),
		ALIQUOTA_ICMS as decimal(15,2),
		BC_ICMS_RECALCULADA as decimal(15,2),
		ICMS_RECALCULADO as decimal(15,2),
		ICMS_PARA_RESSARCIMENTO as decimal(15,2),
		SITUACAO as string,
		MES_APURACAO as string,
		TIPO_DOC as decimal(1,0),
		COD_CONSUMIDOR as string,
		CHAVE_AUTENTICACAO as string,
		TOTAL_MESTRE as decimal(15,2),
		BC_ICMS_MESTRE as decimal(15,2),
		ICMS_DESTACADO as decimal(15,2),
		INSCRICAO_ESTADUAL as string,
		RAZAO_SOCIAL as string,
		FL_STATUS_GERAL as string,
		ID_LOTE_AJUSTE as decimal(28,0),
		ID_LOTE_CONVENIO as decimal(28,0),
		CD_ITEM as string,
		DS_ITEM as string,
		HR_AJUSTE as string,
		HR_ATRIBUICAO as string,
		NOME_BILLING as string,
		TIPO_CLIENTE as string,
		DT_ABERTURA_IMPUG as timestamp,
		DT_FECHA_IMPUG as timestamp,
		SALDO_DEVEDOR as decimal(15,2),
		SALDO_FATURA_INI as decimal(15,2),
		SALDO_FATURA_FIM as decimal(15,2),
		COD_CLIENTE as string,
		TIPO_DOCUMENTO as string,
		NOME_FANTASIA as string,
		COD_GRUPO as string,
		NOME_GRUPO_ECONOMICO as string,
		SEGMENTO_CLIENTE as string,
		SUB_SEGMENTO_CLIENTE as string,
		SEGMENTO_VALOR as string,
		CLASSE_ELEGIBILIDADE as string,
		DESCR_SERV_AJUSTE as string,
		DESCR_SERV as string,
		CONTACONTABIL_DB as string,
		CONTACONTABIL_CR as string,
		DESCR_CONTACONTABIL_DB as string,
		DESCR_CONTACONTABIL_CR as string,
		SALDO_POS_AJUSTE as decimal(15,2),
		TIPO_OPERACAO as string,
		TIPO_TERMINAL as string,
		DONO_RECEITA as string,

parameters{

source(output(
		account_no as string,
		id_fatura as string,
		id_open_item as string,
		nota_fiscal as string,
		vlr_item as decimal(15,2),
		serie_nf as string,
		conta_cobranca as string,
		vlr_total_atribuido as decimal(15,2),
		vlr_atribuido as decimal(15,2),
		dt_ajuste as timestamp,
		hr_ajuste as string,

		id_operadora as string,
		desc_motivo as string,
		id_fatura_origem as string,
		vlr_pagamento as decimal(15,2),
		dt_emissao as timestamp,
		vlr_fatura as decimal(15,2),
		uf_nf as string,
		cpf_cnpj as string,
		tipo_documento as string,
		desc_contestacao as string,
		desc_detalhe as string,
		cc_db_ajuste as string,
		cc_cr_ajuste as string,
		tipo_instancia as string,
		subtype_code as decimal(19,0),
		tipo_detalhe as string,
		vlr_imposto_constestado as decimal(15,2),
		vlr_imposto_icms as decimal(15,2),
		vlr_bruto as decimal(15,2),
		vlr_outros_impostos as decimal(15,2),
		dt_vencto_original as date,
		dt_pagamento as date,
		id_detalhe as decimal(10,0)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: ("SELECT d.account_no,i.id_fatura,i.id_open_item,i.nota_fiscal,i.vlr_item,i.serie_nf,c.conta_cobranca,c.vlr_contestado as vlr_total_atribuido,d.vlr_contestado as vlr_atribuido,d.dt_contestacao as dt_ajuste,CONVERT(VARCHAR, d.dt_contestacao, 8) as hr_ajuste,d.desc_operadora,d.id_operadora,d.desc_motivo,c.id_fatura_origem,c.vlr_pagamento,c.dt_emissao,c.vlr_fatura,i.uf_nf,d.cpf_cnpj,case when len(d.cpf_cnpj) = 11 then 'CPF' when len(d.cpf_cnpj) = 14 then 'CNPJ' else null end as tipo_documento,d.desc_contestacao,d.desc_detalhe,d.cc_db_ajuste,d.cc_cr_ajuste,d.tipo_instancia,d.subtype_code,d.tipo_detalhe,d.vlr_imposto_constestado,d.vlr_imposto_icms,d.vlr_bruto,d.vlr_outros_impostos,c.dt_vencto_original,c.dt_pagamento,d.id_detalhe FROM [convenio].[CVTB_FATURA_CON_KENAN] c, [convenio].[CVTB_FATURA_ITEM_KENAN] i, [convenio].[CVTB_FATURA_DET_KENAN] d  WHERE c.id_fatura_origem = i.id_fatura AND c.id_fatura_origem = d.id_fatura AND convert(numeric, c.cpf_cnpj)  = convert(numeric, i.cpf_cnpj) AND convert(numeric, c.cpf_cnpj)  = convert(numeric, d.cpf_cnpj) AND c.conta_cobranca = i.conta_cobranca AND c.conta_cobranca = d.conta_cobranca AND d.id_open_item = i.id_open_item AND c.id_lote_arquivo in (SELECT id_lote_arquivo FROM CONVENIO.CVTB_LOTE_ARQUIVO WHERE ID_LOTE = {$pLote}) AND i.id_lote_arquivo in (SELECT id_lote_arquivo FROM CONVENIO.CVTB_LOTE_ARQUIVO WHERE ID_LOTE = {$pLote}) AND d.id_lote_arquivo in (SELECT id_lote_arquivo FROM CONVENIO.CVTB_LOTE_ARQUIVO WHERE id_lote = {$pLote})"),
	format: 'query') ~> TabelasKenan
